reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 343/03: EXTENDING TIME PERIODS IN ONTARIO REGULATION 340/94 RELATING TO DRIVERS' LICENCES
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXTENDING TIME PERIODS IN ONTARIO REGULATION 340/94 RELATING TO DRIVERS’ LICENCES
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 343/03: EXTENDING TIME PERIODS IN ONTARIO REGULATION 340/94 RELATING TO DRIVERS' LICENCES
reg_info.act_under: Highway Traffic Act   Code de la route

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, a reference to a provision is a reference to a provision of Ontario Regulation 340/94. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. In this Regulation, a reference to a provision is a reference to a provision of Ontario Regulation 340/94. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The term of validity of a driver’s licence is extended beyond the expiry date shown on the driver’s licence until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the term of validity would expire on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The term of validity of a driver’s licence is extended beyond the expiry date shown on the driver’s licence until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the term of validity would expire on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 2.

content.section: Certificates of driver improvement course extended
content.content: 3. Despite subsection 13 (1), the period of five years referred to in that subsection is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Despite subsection 13 (1), the period of five years referred to in that subsection is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 3.

content.section: Certificates of driver education or motorcycle safety course extended
content.content: 4. Despite subsections 28 (9) and (10), the term of validity of a certificate referred to in those subsections is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the term of validity would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. Despite subsections 28 (9) and (10), the term of validity of a certificate referred to in those subsections is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the term of validity would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 4.

content.content: 5. (1) Despite subclauses 29 (1) (a) (i) and (ii), the periods of three years and one year respectively that are referred to in those subclauses are extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the period of three years or one year, as the case may be, would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 5 (1). (2) Despite clause 29 (1) (b), the period of three years referred to in that clause is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 5 (2). (3) Despite subclauses 29 (2) (a) (i) and (ii), the periods of three years and one year respectively that are referred to in those subclauses are extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the period of three years or one year, as the case may be, would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 5 (3). (4) Despite clause 29 (2) (b), the period of three years referred to in that clause is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 5 (4). (5) Despite subsections 29 (7), (9) and (10), the period of three years referred to in those subsections is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 5 (5).
content.raw_html:
5. (1) Despite subclauses 29 (1) (a) (i) and (ii), the periods of three years and one year respectively that are referred to in those subclauses are extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the period of three years or one year, as the case may be, would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 5 (1).

(2) Despite clause 29 (1) (b), the period of three years referred to in that clause is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 5 (2).

(3) Despite subclauses 29 (2) (a) (i) and (ii), the periods of three years and one year respectively that are referred to in those subclauses are extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, the period of three years or one year, as the case may be, would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 5 (3).

(4) Despite clause 29 (2) (b), the period of three years referred to in that clause is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 5 (4).

(5) Despite subsections 29 (7), (9) and (10), the period of three years referred to in those subsections is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire, to the detriment of an applicant, on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 5 (5).

content.section: Time to notify Ministry of changes extended
content.content: 6. Despite subsections 33 (1) and (2), the period of six days referred to in those subsections is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. Despite subsections 33 (1) and (2), the period of six days referred to in those subsections is extended until the day this Regulation is revoked if, without the extension, that period would expire on or after August 14, 2003. O. Reg. 343/03, s. 6.
